title: New: mono mono – Feel
body:
Danish outfit **mono mono** have the sort of wistful romanticism to them that the likes of Purity Ring and Chromatics really thrive upon.

On their latest single, _Feel_, their fifth released so far, they’re again in a playful mood, mixing choppy electronic production with a vaguely Portishead-esque lead vocal. Another impressive release for the duo. Check it out below.

On their latest single, Feel, their fifth released so far, they’re again in a playful mood, mixing choppy electronic production with a vaguely Portishead-esque lead vocal. Another impressive release for the duo. \[…\]
